Html:
Hi folks,

While I appreciate that the PST SDK ignores PST passwords, is it currently possible to programatically alter the existing password (assuming that the current password is known), or indeed remove it?

Actually, to take it one step further .. if the password for a PST is known, is there ANY mechanism to either reset it programatically?  I ave read a lot of posts on the internet stating that it is not possible, but they are all quite dated.

Thanks in advance.
